name: Ring of Fortune
description:
You play as a dream seer: a fortune-teller that can see glimpses of their fate through dreams. You have a habit of finding magical artefacts in reality that you can recall from your dreams. With the help of your partner Lucia, and your dream artefacts to guide you, you will infiltrate a mansion and seek the ring of fortune

But what fortune lies ahead? Power? Love? Or will your journey have lasting consequences?
